description: Local supply of goods or services which are subject to zero rated supplies.

Supply of goods from Malaysia to Designated Area (Pulau Langkawi, Labuan, & Pulau Tioman) which are subject to zero rated supplies. (By referring Customs Form No. 2 (K2), and/or other reference documents)
Exportation of goods or services. (By referring Customs Form No. 2 (K2),and/or other reference documents)
Incidental exempt supplies under GST legislations.
Any adjustment made to Output Tax (e.g., Bad Debt Recovered, & other output tax adjustments)
